title: USSD Block configuration
description: This is a block that define post input params form the ussd from your provider

USSD_PHONE_KEY.title: Ussd phone key
USSD_PHONE_KEY.description: This is the phone number of the user  (defaults to process.env.USSD_PHONE_KEY)

USSD_SESSION_KEY.title: Ussd session key
USSD_SESSION_KEY.description: This the key for the current session sent by the ussd provider (defaults to process.env.USSD_SESSION_KEY)

USSD_MSG_KEY.title: Ussd session key
USSD_MSG_KEY.description: This is the key for user input (defaults to process.env.USSD_MSG_KEY)

USSD_URL.title: Ussd endpoint
USSD_URL.description: This the url where this server will send the formated ussd request to (defaults to process.env.USSD_URL)
